#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(Hardware)
set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES "")
add_library(Hardware ADC.cpp BBB.cpp EC12P.cpp eqep.cpp GPIO.cpp Microscope.cpp PWM.cpp Resolution.cpp SoilCape.cpp USB.cpp)
target_link_libraries(Hardware "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")
set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG} -std=c++11 -ggdb -ffunction-sections -O0")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG} -std=c++11 -ggdb -ffunction-sections -O0")
